channel.description:

To Edit everything to be ready for your website/server please follow this below: 2. Go to Index.php and Edit [/center] Server Name Here content="Server Name">

item.title: New Template Created By islappyy For Rsps
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Then what was the point in giving it the .php extension if you’re not going to be using simple php to help along in a multi use template, seems rather pointless to me.

Read full topic
item.source: New Template Created By islappyy For Rsps

item.title: New Template Created By islappyy For Rsps
item.dc:creator: @islappyy islappyy
item.description:
@islappyy wrote:

Ruby:

Since you named the index with a .php extension why not utilise php for the simple tasks such as changing a name? Declare them as a variable in a file, include the file into index.php. Instead of re-writing the same things again and again why not make it so you only have to rewrite something?

so they can upload it and edit it and also see what they are editing at the same time for those who don’t understand php or don’t have xampp

Read full topic
item.source: New Template Created By islappyy For Rsps
